name: Freetalk
body: # FreeTalk > Feel Free in Talk ## Intro 1. An online chat tool writen mostly by C. 2. Continuous Updating. 3. All distributed versions will be maintained. ## Design Draft ### Version 0.1 #### For Server: * Local IPv4 address, Port 9000. * `select()` to handle I/O Multiplexing. * Keep all clients' nickname. #### For Client: * Local IPv4 address, Port unspecified; * Register a nickname. ## User Guide
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
